channel.title: Technical Insights on EMPHZ | Vetted GRP Composite Ecosystems
channel.description: Recent content in Technical Insights on EMPHZ | Vetted GRP Composite Ecosystems

item.title: Critical Fire Safety in Industrial Enclosures
item.description: In high-voltage electrical distribution, the enclosure is the last line of defense. We explore why specifying UL 94 V-0 rated SMC materials is crucial for preventing fire propagation in substations.

item.title: The Sustainability of Composite Materials
item.description: While the initial production of composites captures energy, their 50+ year lifespan significantly offsets the carbon cost compared to steel assets that need replacement every 10-15 years in corrosive zones.

item.title: Why GRP is Used in Outdoor Infrastructure
item.description: GRP (Glass Reinforced Plastic) is becoming the standard material for outdoor infrastructure where traditional materials fail. We see this most often in coastal areas or chemical plants where steel enclosures rust through in a few years.
